item.title: Best practices for REST API design
About
item.description: Welcome to my space! I am Prajwal S, engineer, software developer. Hopefully, I’ll tell you more about myself someday. You can find me on: GitHub X(Twitter) LinkedIn Facebook Instagram Instagram - photonstruck [Email](mailto:prajwalsandinje at gmail dot com)

Celery is a task queue. It allows us to run tasks asynchronously from Python web applications outside the HTTP request-response cycle. That means if there is a task that will take some time to complete and you donâ€™t want to wait until the completion of the task to respond to the client then we can run such tasks asynchronously by running in the background using celery. This involves two main components celery and a message broker:
